Background.description: how the customer and vendor met to discuss the requirements and vendor proposed its solutions to customer

Business requirement.description: how the customer and vendor interacted and discussed about the needs

Proposed solution.description: how the vendor proposed solutions to the customer for their requirements

Timelines.description: the timelines discussed for the proposed solutions by the vendor

Pricing.description: the pricing for the discussed solutions

Next steps.description: the next steps to be performed or followed upon for successful completion
